heist.concurrent.shared

Class ConcentrationSite

  • java.lang.Object
    • heist.concurrent.shared.ConcentrationSite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConcentrationSite

    public class ConcentrationSite
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConcentrationSite
    The concentration site is where OrdinaryThieves wait for the MasterThief to assign them a AssaultParty. ConcentrationSite is accessed by the MasterThief to get OrdinaryThieves to create and join AssaultParties.

      ConcentrationSite constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • fillAssaultParty

        public void fillAssaultParty(AssaultParty party)
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Fill a Party of OrdinaryThieves with the thieves waiting in this ConcentrationSite. The MasterThief creates the party and adds it to the waiting party list and gets locked until all thieves join the party. The last thief to join the party wakes up the MasterThief.
        Specified by:
        fillAssaultParty in interface ConcentrationSite
        Parameters:
        party - Party to be filled with thieves.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Exception

      • prepareExcursion

        public void prepareExcursion(OrdinaryThief thief)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        OrdinaryThief enters the ConcentrationSite and joins the assault party. The last OrdinaryThief to join the assault party wakes up the MasterThief that is waiting in createNewParty.
        Specified by:
        prepareExcursion in interface ConcentrationSite
        Parameters:
        thief - OrdinaryThief to add.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Exception
        java.lang.Exception - A exception may be thrown depending on the implementation.
